news.title: Tribal Forest Rights and Conservation Balance
news.content: Madhya Pradesh High Court establishes guidelines for balancing tribal forest rights with conservation efforts, ensuring sustainable forest management and tribal welfare.

news.title: Agricultural Water Management and Irrigation Rights
news.content: The court directs implementation of efficient agricultural water management systems and equitable irrigation rights distribution across Madhya Pradesh farming communities.

news.title: Heritage Site Protection and Tourism Development
news.content: Madhya Pradesh High Court mandates protection measures for heritage sites while promoting sustainable tourism development, balancing conservation with economic growth.
